caption.center: NETTIE B. HELD, RESPONDENT, v. W. ELTZROTH, APPELLANT.

posture.italic: Appeal from District Court, Yellowstone County; Guy C. Derry,

opinion.opinion_text: The parties to the above-entitled action having stipulated that the appeal may be dismissed without costs to either party, the action having been settled, it is ordered that the appeal be dismissed without costs.
opinion.attorneys:
Messrs. Wood Cooke, for Appellant.
Mr. E.E. Collins, for Respondent.
